original_title: Rouen to Hiroshima: Battle of the Skies
overview: On August 6th, 1945, the first atomic bomb used in combat was dropped over Hiroshima, Japan. However, the story began three years earlier, in French skies over Rouen when the same pilot led the first daylight-bombing mission against occupied Europe.
title: Rouen to Hiroshima: Battle of the Skies
